section.name: Current Astrogrid Releases
section.P: Follow the links to the left for the documentation for the current releases. This documentation in turn has links to the binaries, source code and installation information.

subsection.name: Itn06 Snapshot
subsection.P: The latest build is Itn06 Snapshot. This code is undergoing development and is built several times daily. The latest Itn06 build is deployed at least once a day to this portal on Twmbarlwm.

subsection.name: Itn06 Case 3
subsection.P: Case 3 is now complete. The Maven docs for this branch can be found by following the link on the left. An installation of this case is on Zhumulangma.

subsection.name: Itn06 TechPreview
subsection.P: A partial version of case 3 has been published to Beta Testers. Milestones within Itn06 and should be built at the end of each cases after tested stable. TechPreview.
